name: Night Shift (itch) (katbird)
description:
On the Night Shift . . . Just another night of preventing chaos from overtaking the world, one tentacle at a time.

Description:

You're a little dude racing against the clock to hold back the nightly onslaught of terror. Jump on top of the tentacles to keep them from reaching the top of the wall. If all of them slither past your defenses, that's the end, friend. Oh, and don't slip off and fall in the roiling black slime pit either. Our workers comp policy doesn't cover whatever happens down there.

Created for my first game jam.
Inspired by that Commodores song. 

No, really.

Play fullscreen for best effect!

Special thanks to VanWinkle for the super SFX.

Fonts used:
KG Let Her Go
http://kimberlygeswein.com
Headline: 
https://www.dafont.com/headline.font

Made with Unity 2019.4.7.
